description: Single-storey ground floor rear extension with a glazed roof; single-storey ground floor partial side infill extension; roof extension over the rear outrigger building; demolition of an existing first floor partial side/rear infill extension; refurbishment of an existing first floor roof terrace involving alterations to the rear-facing fenestration, screening and balustrades; alterations to the fenestration of the northeast-facing side elevation; alterations to the roof of the existing rear extension; refurbishment of the forecourt area involving alterations to the landscaping and boundary treatment; and installation of five rows of solar PV / solar thermal equipment
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings numbered/titled: Heritage, Design & Access Statement (Ref. 16/08/JJ); 16/08/JJ/02; 16/08/JJ/03; 16/08/JJ/04; 16/08/JJ/05; 16/08/JJ/15 Rev. B; 16/08/JJ/16 Rev. B; 16/08/JJ/20 Rev. B; and 16/08/JJ/21 Rev. B.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Notwithstanding the roof terrace proposed in the drawings listed in Condition 2, no part of the rear roof extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the external appearance and character of the host building and minimise the development's impact on the amenity of the surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Any side-facing windows installed on an upper-floor must be obscure-glazed and non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7m above the floor of the room in which the window is installed.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Any solar PV or solar thermal equipment installed on the roof of the subject dwellinghouse must adhere to the of provisions, limitation and conditions of Schedule 2, Part 14, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
